workflowInfo.workflowDescription: This workflow will generate certificates for ZOWE

variable.name: zowe_install_path
variable.label: Install Path
variable.description: Specify the path that will be used for the ZOWE runtime installation

string.errorMessage: Please specify proper full USS path ending without a trailing slash.

variable.name: USSDIR
variable.label: Path to new zowe-setup-certificates.env
variable.abstract: Location to which your new customized environment file will be created
variable.description: Location to which your new customized environment file will be created

string.errorMessage: Please specify proper full path ending without a slash.

variable.name: HOSTNAME
variable.label: HOSTNAME
variable.abstract: The hostname of the system running API Mediation.
variable.description: The hostname of the system running API Mediation. If the hostname is omitted, the configuration script attempts to calculate the value on its own.

variable.name: IPADDRESS
variable.label: IPADDRESS
variable.abstract: The IP address of the system running API Mediation.
variable.description: The IP address of the system running API Mediation. If the IP address is omitted, the configuration script attempts to calculate the value on its own.

variable.name: VERIFY_CERTIFICATES
variable.label: VERIFY_CERTIFICATES
variable.abstract: Should APIML verify certificates of services - true/false
variable.description: Should APIML verify certificates of services - true/false

variable.name: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE
variable.label: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE
variable.description: Path to a PKCS12 keystore with a server certificate for API Mediaton Layer (APIML)

string.errorMessage: Please specify proper full path ending without a slash.

variable.name: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS
variable.label: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS
variable.abstract: Alias of the certificate in the keystore
variable.description: Alias of the certificate in the keystore

variable.name: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES
variable.label: EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES
variable.description: Public certificates of trusted CAs - multiple certificates # delimitad with space has to be enclosed with quotes ("cer1 cer2")

variable.name: ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE
variable.label: ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE
variable.description: Public certificates of z/OSMF - multiple certificates delimited with space has to be enclosed with quotes ("cer1 cer2")

variable.name: KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
variable.label: KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
variable.abstract: Password that is used to secure EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE keystore
variable.description: Password that is used to secure EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE keystore and that will be also used to secure newly generated keystores for API Mediation

string.errorMessage: Please specify proper full USS path ending without a slash.

variable.name: KEYSTORE_ALIAS
variable.label: KEYSTORE_ALIAS
variable.abstract: Alias for the certificate in the generated keystore
variable.description: Alias for the certificate in the generated keystore

variable.name: ZOWE_USER_ID
variable.label: ZOWE_USER_ID
variable.abstract: User id to set up ownership of the generated certificates
variable.description: User id to set up ownership of the generated certificates

variable.name: ZOWE_GROUP_ID
variable.label: ZOWE_GROUP_ID
variable.abstract: User id to set up ownership of the generated certificates
variable.description: User id to set up ownership of the generated certificates

step.name: define_variables
step.title: Define Variables
step.instructions: Run this step to initialize variable values

step.name: Substitute_vars_in_env_file
step.title: New Custom zowe-setup-certificates.env
step.description: Creates new zowe-setup-certificates.env in user specified location adn substitutes values
step.instructions: This step creates zowe-setup-certificates.env and substitutes variables

template.inlineTemplate:
if test ! -d ${USSDIR}; then mkdir -p -m 755 ${USSDIR}; fi cp ${zowe_install_path}/bin/zowe-setup-certificates.env ${USSDIR}/zowe-setup-certificates.env chmod 755 ${USSDIR}/zowe-setup-certificates.env
HOSTNAME='${HOSTNAME}' IPADDRESS='${IPADDRESS}' VERIFY_CERTIFICATES='${VERIFY_CERTIFICATES}' EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE='${EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE}' EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS='${EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS}' EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES='${EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES}' ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE='${ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE}' KEYSTORE_PASSWORD='${KEYSTORE_PASSWORD}' KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY='${KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY}' KEYSTORE_ALIAS='${KEYSTORE_ALIAS}' ZOWE_USER_ID='${ZOWE_USER_ID}' ZOWE_GROUP_ID='${ZOWE_GROUP_ID}'
sed -e "s#HOSTNAME=#HOSTNAME=$HOSTNAME#g" -e "s#IPADDRESS=#IPADDRESS=$IPADDRESS#g" -e "s#VERIFY_CERTIFICATES=true#VERIFY_CERTIFICATES=$VERIFY_CERTIFICATES#g" -e "s#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE=#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE=$EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE#g" -e "s#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS=#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS=$EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_ALIAS#g" -e "s#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES=#EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES=$EXTERNAL_CERTIFICATE_AUTHORITIES#g" -e "s#ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE=#ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE=$ZOSMF_CERTIFICATE#g" -e "s#KEYSTORE_PASSWORD=password#KEYSTORE_PASSWORD=$KEYSTORE_PASSWORD#g" -e "s#KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY=/global/zowe/keystore#KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY=$KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY#g" -e "s#KEYSTORE_ALIAS=localhost#KEYSTORE_ALIAS=$KEYSTORE_ALIAS#g" -e "s#ZOWE_USER_ID=ZWESVUSR#ZOWE_USER_ID=$ZOWE_USER_ID#g" -e "s#ZOWE_GROUP_ID=ZWEADMIN#ZOWE_GROUP_ID=$ZOWE_GROUP_ID#g" ${zowe_install_path}/bin/zowe-setup-certificates.env > ${USSDIR}/zowe-setup-certificates.env

step.name: Run_Gen_Script
step.title: Execute zowe-setup-certificates.sh
step.description: This step will execute zowe-setup-certificates.sh with customized zowe-setup-certificates.env file
step.instructions: This step will execute zowe-setup-certificates.sh with customized zowe-setup-certificates.env file
